CookbookÂ¶

Now we’ll show you what you can do with this API and give you some tips and tricks how to use blue leaf.

The cookbook is very small and will be filled with more content in following releases.

The following topics will be covered in future, but I was too lazy to write them (documenting isn’t fun...):

  • Navigations using scrollposition and sticky mixins
  • Popovers, Dialogs und Dropdowns using variables and trigger
  • More complex menu structures using the list module
  • Image positioning and aligning using container
  • Integrating blue leaf with AngularJS

Until these golden times, please have a look at the demo pages and the SASS source code.

Contents:

  • Using blue leaf with Drupal
    • Drupal 7
    • Drupal 8
  • Creating jQuery-Plugins from the Plugin API
